title: Genre Crossings
author: verias
text:
I'm prepping to head out to Midsouth Con for the weekend, and while figuring out what to do to help keep all of you lovely people entertained, the idea struck me of steampunking out Mandrake. Particularly since she's from a cyberpunk world.

I think the look suits her quite well, don't you?

replies.author: Adamas*Guest*
replies.text: No, doesn't look good at all. *saves the picture*

replies.author: AnrDaemon*Guest*
replies.text:
I'm not sure if you're aware, but your CMS does not allow for statics caching.Everything is served through PHP, wasting your bandwidth like crazy.
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Server: nginx
Date: Sun, 25 Mar 2018 21:15:42 GMT
Content-Type: image/png
Transfer-Encoding: chunked
Connection: keep-alive
X-Powered-By: PHP/5.4.16
Expires: Thu, 19 Nov 1981 08:52:00 GMT
Cache-Control: no-store, no-cache, must-revalidate, post-check=0, pre-check=0
Pragma: no-cache
Set-Cookie: PHPSESSID=inn50upuft8g72dibtjmj44su7; path=/
X-Powered-By: PleskLin
